DOC.brief_title: A Study Compare Safety Efficacy New Eye Drop Formulation With REFRESH PLUS® Participants Following LASIK Refractive Surgery
DOC.criteria: Patients schedule LASIK surgery eye . Any systemic medication use within 3 month screen ( include counter , herbal , prescription , nutritional supplement ) may affect dry eye vision Use topical eye medication prescribe use pre postoperative care Use RESTASIS® topical ophthalmic cyclosporine product within 6 month prior Screening Eye infection , inflammation , allergy Soft contact lenses previous 7 day rigid contact lenses previous 30 day prior LASIK surgery .
